title: Egypt: a new horizon
creator_credit: Alfred Wagg Pictures and Audio Productions
brief_description: The River Nile has always been the key to Egypt’s economy. Today it is bringing a new horizon to Egypt. It is the source of hydro-electric power, and is vital to the projects of reclaiming previous arid land. Other Egyptian industries, and the tourist trade are discussed.
